markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Master of Many Styles](/Feats.aspx?ID=480) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 165 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Stance Savant (Monk)](/Feats.aspx?ID=472)

**Trigger**
Your turn begins

</column>

---

You move between stances in an unceasing dance. You use an action with the stance trait.

<title level="2">Master of Many Styles leads to...</title>
[Ki Center](/Feats.aspx?ID=1759)
name: Master of Many Styles
